summary:
A judge has found that NSO Group, maker of the Pegasus spyware, has violated the US Computer Fraud and Abuse Act by hacking WhatsApp in order to spy on people using it. 
Jon Penney and I wrote a legal paper on the case.
title: Spyware Maker NSO Group Found Liable for Hacking WhatsApp

summary: Finished reading my 34th book of 2024.  Some of my favorite quotes from The Answer is No by Fredrik Backman
title: The Answer is No by Fredrik Backman
